definition: variant of 輝映|辉映[hui1 ying4]
sunshine/to shine upon/variant of 輝|辉[hui1]
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
old variant of 映[ying4]

sentences.english: Where the sun enterd, the doctor does not.
sentences.chinese: 阳光晖映处，医生就不需。

sentences.english: I am the stars warmly greaming, Prada shoes women, over Darnassus softly dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 我是暖和闪耀的星，晖映达纳苏斯的安谧长逝。

sentences.english: Miss Li, like a shining star, shines on my way to success.
sentences.chinese: 李教员，就像一颗闪亮的星晖映着我前进的道路。

sentences.english: Miss Li, like a shining star, shines in my path of success.
sentences.chinese: 李教员，就像一颗闪亮的星晖映着我前进的道路。

definition: to reflect/to shine
to set off one another
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
old variant of 映[ying4]
to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
to set each other off nicely
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
clouds tinged with sunset hues
glow of the setting sun
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
to shine brightly/(fig.) to perceive clearly
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
bright sun/beautiful day
trees/greenery
clear and crystalline (of water)
luxuriant (growth)/numerous/cloudy/misty/snowing heavily
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
